column5: I was up a few weeks ago, store was closed windows had paper all over them, couldnt see inside.  Did Brian close up shop for good, out of business??  Anyone know if he moved to a new location?  thanks
Ijust tried calling. Out of service.
I herd from several people that he's having medical issues, and had to close up shop for a while.  No idea when, or if he will open again.
Ya,a fella at work said he was in the hospital.
This is a true statement.  Brian is having medical issues.  Wish him the best.

A friend and I dropped by there three Fridays ago to get a fishing licence and there was a notice on the door that the landlord had taken possession of the premises.  The store was still full of tackle and everything  Burt
I havent been up to see Brian since the fall, This is news you never want to hear.   Hope he gets better soon.    Good guy!
All the best Brian & keep your head up Tight Lines SBK
